data.name: Zen
data.text: Meditative discipline emphasizing mindfulness and direct experiential understanding.

data.name: Kapalbhati
data.text: Dynamic breathing exercise that detoxifies the body and energizes the mind through rapid exhalations and passive inhalations.

data.name: Shoonya
data.text: Encourage conscious non-doing, allowing the mind to rest in a state of pure awareness and detachment.

data.name: Naddi Shuddhi
data.text: Alternate nostril breathing, balances energy channels and harmonizes the mind and body.

data.name: Yoga Nidra
data.text: A guided meditative practice that induces deep relaxation and conscious awareness.

data.name: Transcending Duality
data.text: Moving beyond dichotomies like good and bad to experience the unity of existence.

data.name: Qigong
data.text: Ancient Chinese practice integrating movement, breath, and meditation to cultivate life energy (Qi).

data.name: Taiji
data.text: Also called Tai Chi, is a martial art and meditative practice that harmonizes body and mind through slow, flowing movements.
